Blackstorm:

"Understood Maxima"replied Starstorm.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> Battera::
> She nodded. "Understood. This flight will not be logged."
> Though she didn't log the flight, her back up, hidden flight 
recorder 
> was recording her journey, whether she wanted it to or not. She 
just 
> didn't conscously log the flight.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > Maxima was silently seething.  
> > 
> > In her jet mode then transformed. For a while, it would be best 
to 
> be in her 
> > robot mode. She missed this type of flight anyway. 
> > 
> > Glaring back at them. "I won't say... not yet. Nor will you both 
> log this 
> > flight at all! Is that understood?" glaring  back at them with 
her 
> crimson 
> > optics as they soared along.
